subtitle: Rich and tasty, this stuffed whole chicken is perfect served with a potato salad and seasonal lettuce.

method.text: Heat the oil in a frying pan. Cook the onions and bacon for 2-3 min until softened. Drain well. Leave to cool.
Place onion and bacon in a mixing bowl with the cream cheese and parsley. Mix together. Season to taste.
Place the avocado and lemon juice in a food processor. Process until smooth. Stir into the cream cheese mixture. Mix thoroughly. Season to taste if necessary.

Place the chicken, skin side down, on a chopping board. Spoon the mixture into the centre. Fold the sides and ends in, to enclose the filling. Place on a roasting tray. Cook in the oven for 1 hour or until juices run clear when a skewer is inserted into the thickest part.
Serve hot or cold in slices.

title: Chicken stuffed with avocado, bacon and cream cheese
